hero_section.tagline: Crafting unique and convenient design and development solutions for your digital presence.

about_section.title: About BYTCD
about_section.description: BYTCD is a creative studio specializing in bespoke design and robust development. We transform ideas into stunning digital experiences, focusing on user-centric design and cutting-edge technology to deliver solutions that stand out.

contact_section.title: Get in Touch
contact_section.description: Ready to start your next project? Let's create something amazing together.

contact_us_page.title: Contact Us
contact_us_page.description: We'd love to hear from you! Whether you have a project in mind, a question, or just want to say hello, feel free to reach out.
contact_us_page.form_intro: Alternatively, you can fill out the form below, and we'll get back to you as soon as possible.
contact_us_page.form_success: Your message has been sent successfully!
contact_us_page.form_error_failed_send: Failed to send message. Please try again.

not_found_page.title: Page Not Found
not_found_page.description: Oops! The page you're looking for doesn't exist. It might have been moved or deleted.
